song.title: unnamed #5
song.info:
so far, still unsteady. barely breathing, life so slow. so fragile, still voiceless: a name, you'll never know.
say goodnight and close your eyes until these dreams are over. running to / run into the arms of guardian angels
go alone, i cannot follow, i stood away and shed no tears. i know you wished for something better, but where your lover lay is now a soul of stone, my dear.
even though i know that i might never be forgiven, it's a chance i'll take, and if i break you heart you know i'll never be the same.
finally i know that i can never be forgiven.
